tasks.task: Participate in a farming project including cover crop planting, tomato farming, and chicken management.
subtasks: Express gratitude for a grant received for the project.
Acknowledge the project as a learning experience.
Describe the location and setup of the farm.
Explain the model used for the CSA farm (participatory, with a core group managing the CSA).
Detail the diversity of crops grown (e.g., vegetables, ferments) and their management.
Describe the use of a no-till planting aid for cover crops and its challenges.
Discuss the impact of heavy rainfall on the project and farming practices.
Detail the use of chickens for fertilization and managing cover crops.
Explain the fertilization methods used (e.g., compost, mineral addition, cover crops).
Describe the fermentation process for value-added products.
Mention the soil organic matter improvement practices.
Present the results of cover crop trials and their impact on weed pressure.
Discuss the equipment used for farming (e.g., tractors, no-till planting aid).
Describe the management of the CSA (150 members at peak, core group participation).
Discuss the integration of education and community involvement in the farming operation.
Mention future plans for diversifying cover crops and soil management.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Participate in a farming project including cover crop planting, tomato farming, and chicken management.
